bibl.title: Notes on the Chronology of Late Antique Stone Sculpture in Egypt.
Coptic Studies. Acts of the Third International Congress of Coptic Studies. Warsaw, 20-25 August, 1984
bibl.author: TÖRÖK, László

bibl.note: Les sculptures proviennent, en majeure partie, d'Héracléopolis Magna et d'Oxyrhynchus (IVe-Ve s.). Divinités grecques et scènes mythologiques.
TÖRÖK László, Notes on the Chronology of Late Antique Stone Sculpture in Egypt.
Coptic Studies. Acts of the Third International Congress of Coptic Studies. Warsaw, 20-25 August, 1984 (Varsovie, 1990) pp. 437-484, 80 figg.
